import React from 'react'; import { XMarkIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/solid'; interface DemoInstructionsProps { onClose: () => void; } const DemoInstructions: React.FC = ({ onClose }) => { return (

Demo Instructions

Welcome to the Chatbot Demo! This is a frontend-only demo that simulates a real-time chatbot without requiring a backend connection.

Demo Credentials

  • Email: demo@example.com
  • Password: password123

You can use these credentials to log in or register. The chatbot will respond to your messages with predefined responses.

Try These Keywords

The chatbot will respond differently when you include these keywords in your messages:

hello help weather time thanks bye
); }; export default DemoInstructions;
